long_description: in 1998 ecoratio was founded in the netherlands as a supplier of environmentally friendly, high-quality release agents. now we serve the precast and construction industry almost globally. high-quality concrete starts with using the best products; our release agents result from our ambition to develop a product that gives a better concrete surface than the traditional mineral-based release agents. by years of intensive research, we succeeded in developing and supplying a unique range of innovative and environmentally friendly release agents, retarders, curing compounds, and many additional products. all our products are designed to prevent all concrete producers' problems, such as pinholes, corrosion, dust, and discoloration. our entire range is formulated to protect the planet. therefore they are unlabeled and free of hazardous chemicals - without compromising results.
business_tags: chemicals | release agents | concrete | construction | environmentally friendly | concrete production | curing compounds | concrete surfaces
generated_description: ecoratio is a dutch company that was established in 1998 as a supplier of environmentally friendly and high-quality release agents for the precast and construction industry. they specialize in providing release agents, retarders, curing compounds, and other products designed to prevent concrete producers' problems such as pinholes, corrosion, dust, and discoloration. their products are formulated to protect the planet and are unlabeled and free of hazardous chemicals.
